scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The six mostly intact chapters in the early drafts (Folders 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, and 9) have been roughly matched to corresponding chapters in the final publication. However, parts of the chapters may have been moved and used in other chapters, as well. Because it is difficult to determine when pieces are definitively of the same draft, with exception to Folders 4-9, it should not be assumed that all fragments in a folder are of one contiguous draft.
